title: Homegrown Threat: FBI Tracks White Supremicists, Domestic Extremists
teaser: Michael German spent 16 years in the FBI, going undercover with neo-Nazi and white supremacist groups. He talks to NPR's Eric Westervelt about law enforcement's counterterrorism strategy.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
